__e: I don't mean to sound stubborn, but surely it is sorted.
But your father can be stubborn sometimes. But eventually, he always comes around and sees the error of his ways.
But I would like to specially thank someone, someone who many of you have often called stupid, imbecile, fat head, but he's a guy with a big heart.
You're right. He's like a scared little kid who ran away from home and is too stubborn to come back.
All because you were too stubborn to listen to your loved ones.
You're just too stubborn to say thank you, but you're welcome.
Everything's done as it should be, but it's stubborn as a bull:
You're a vision of your mother and your father who's as stubborn as a mule on a hot day.
My wife used to say I was stubborn as a junkyard dog.
It's true what they say, you are as stubborn as your father.
I told him he shouldn't be here at all, but he's just as stubborn as his dad was.
True, look at the situation. Like his grandfather
If you weren't so stubborn and so drunk, you would be there too, but you weren't invited.
And I'm sorry, but you play it hard and-and being hard-headed and doing it your way, that's why Bella was taken.
I know you think I'm headstrong and you've always been there for me.
How is it possible that your stomach is more stubborn than you are?
You really are Hard-Hat Harry's little girl, aren't you?
You're the one who's colder than I am.
